original_title: ไพรรีพินาศ ป่ามรณะ
overview: A police officer, a local guide and his daughter follow the trail of a prison escapee, Nasor, into a forest with many secrets, one of which relates to the death of Nasor's father by the father of the officer. As the group ventures deeper into the forest, the eerie realm unleashes its spiriits.
tagline: A killer seeking revenge. A cop looking for justice. An ancient evil out to collect their souls.
title: Vengeance
